entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT IN EFFECT, Calgary
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM MDT Wednesday 04 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, 10.4°C
entry.summary:

Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: 10.4°C

Visibility: 64.4 km
Humidity: 43 %

Wind: WSW 9 km/h
